name: Big Guardian Mega Hopper
description:
Get ready to blast off on an epic journey. Race with your heroes while jumping, rolling and knocking obstacles off the track. Collect as many items as you can within the limitation of time!
In Free Version Game Start with 200 Coins

GAME FEATURES
• Simple controller by pressing JUMP button.
• Amazing graphics.
• Collect the items to get FEVER and explore the WORLD of GALAXY STAR!!!
• Collect all characters
• Challenge yourself by defeat your High Score.
